Lady Hawk nods apreciatively and follows Zardus, her middle eye 
sweeps the hallways observing scanners and autoguns, electronics, 
fire supression systems everything it can see. "Your ship does little 
to impress me, I hope your lab will be an improvement." 

Her lack of contact with her own race showed as she kept being to 
honest with everyone she met. her lessons on courtesy didn't extend 
to learning humility.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Zardus::
> 
> Zardus nods, looking at Lady Hawk. Something about her felt 
strange, 
> like she was hiding something...
> 
> "I'll advise you to be more careful in the future," he 
says, "Outside 
> rank means very little on this planet. A simple Predacon could 
> easilly become ruler of a giant faction. I'll show you to the lab, 
> but be careful. The ship will be watching you closely."
> 
> He turns around, motioning for Lady Hawk to follow as he walks into 
> the ship, heading for the labs.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "Lady Hawk saw Zardus exit the ship "I meant no disrespect 
towards 
> > your lackey she just needed to be educated in manners when 
> > associating with higher stature." she could tell by the way 
Zardus 
> > carried himself that he was a bot who wasn't impressed 
easily. "If 
> > you would show me to one of your labs I'll demonstrate some of my 
> > findings." she'd hoped that he wasn't a scientist or he might see 
> > through her deception and know that she was usingsomeone elses 
> > technology.
